1. Make sure you have jevents component installed in j1.5 site and its database in not hacked
2. Do things in Readme.txt of redMIGRATOR component
3. Install new version of jevents component (jevents_3.1.11) in new j2.5.x or j3.x
4. Install and enable redmigrator 3rd jevents plugin (plg_redmigrator_jevents)
